channel.name: PopTV US
channel.title: Criminal Minds
channel.desc: The BAU team heads to Portland, Ore., to investigate a chilling abduction that may be linked to a local couple who were killed in their home a week earlier.

channel.name: PopTV US
channel.title: Criminal Minds
channel.desc: The BAU team flies to Iowa to investigate the disappearance of three 10-year-old children who appear to have been abducted from their homes, with surveillance video from a park as their only lead to finding the children's whereabouts.
